title: What are the Tamil songs that can be dedicated to brother by sister? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are Tamil songs which are partly sung by the sister and partly by the brother with equally good lyrics dedicated to each other.  Song: Malarnthum Malaratha | Movie: Pasamalar | Music: MS Viswanathan | Lyrics: Kannadasan Malarnthum Malaratha HD Song  Song: Then Kizhakku Cheemayile | Movie: Kizhakku Cheemayile | Music: AR Rahaman | Lyrics: Vairamuthu Then Kizhakku Video Song | Kizhakku Cheemayile Tamil Movie | Vijayakumar | Radhika | AR Rahman  Song: Annan Oru Kovil | Movie: Annan Oru Kovil Movie | Music: MS Viswanathan Annan Oru Kovil Song | Sivaji Ganesan | Sujatha | Annan Oru Kovil Movie  Song: Yenga Annan | Movie: Namma Veettu Pillai | Music: D Imman | Lyrics: Vignesh Shivan Yenga Annan - Official Video Song | Namma Veettu Pillai | Sivakarthikeyan | Sun Pictures  Song: Vellayai Manam | Movie: Chokka Thangam | Music: Deva Vellayai Manam Video Song | Chokka Thangam Tamil Movie | Vijayakanth | Soundarya | Deva

Annan oru koil——————-——Annan oru koil Intha manrathil odi varum------Policekaran magal Malarndum malaratha------------Pasamalar Oru kodiyil iru malargal-----------Kanjithalaivan Kannanin sannadhiyil——-——-Oru kodiyil iru malargal Poo mazhai thoovi-----------------Ninathathai mudippavan Oru thanga rathathil---------------Dharma yudham Thangachi sirichale-----————Sivappu sooriyan Olimayamana ethirkaalam-----Pachai vilakku Poo mudippal intha--——-——-Nenjirukkum varai Thanjavur melam--——————Simla special
